Configuration

APP_DATA_DIR Directory where updates of app & libs are cached.
APP_NAME Name of your app. Excluding the ”.exe” on on windows.
DEBUG enable/disable debug mode
DEV_DATA_DIR Directory on dev machine for nst to do its work. Defaults to Current Working Directory
KEY_LENGTH Length of Key Pair. Must be a multipule of 256. Default 2048. In 2014 you should not use a key length less then 2048.
PRIVATE_KEY_NAME Name given to your private key. Defaults to APP_NAME.pem
PUBLIC_KEY_NAME Name given to your public key. Defaults to APP_NAME.pub
PUBLIC_KEY Public key. Used on client side
UPDATE_URL Where clients looks for updates
UPDATE_PATCHES enable/disable creation of patches
REMOTE_DIR Remote directory to place updates
HOST Remote host to connect to for ssh
SSH_USERNAME SSH user
SSH_KEY_PATH Path to ssh private key
ACCESS_KEY_ID AWS access key id
SECRET_ACCESS_KEY AWS secret access key
BUCKET_NAME AWS bucket name
